C6: cough, chest_pain, phlegm, mild_fever, fatigue, breathlessness, wheezing
C7: Bronchitis is the inflammation of the bronchial tubes that carry air to the lungs. It is usually caused by viruses, bacteria, or exposure to smoke and irritants. It leads to persistent cough, mucus production, and chest discomfort.

C2: Tuz iste’molini darhol kamaytirish
C3: Hozirda stressni kamaytirib, tinch joyda dam olish
C4: Yurish, yengil mashqlarni muntazam bajarish
C5: Mevali-sabzavotli, kam yog‘li ovqatlar bilan ovqatlanish
C6: headache, dizziness, chest_pain, fatigue, nosebleed, blurred_vision, shortness_of_breath
C7: Hypertension is a chronic condition where the blood pressure in the arteries is persistently elevated. Often called a “silent killer,” it can lead to heart disease, stroke, and kidney failure if left uncontrolled.

C2: Temirga boy ovqatlar (qarag‘at, jigar, ismaloq) iste’mol qilish
C3: Temirni yaxshi singdirish uchun C vitamini bilan birga ovqatlanish
C4: Choy va qahvani ovqat bilan emas, keyin ichishga harakat qilish

C7: Iron deficiency anemia occurs when the body lacks enough iron to produce hemoglobin, the protein in red blood cells that carries oxygen. It leads to fatigue, weakness, and pale skin, and is common in menstruating women, pregnant individuals, and those with poor diets.

C2: Iliq bug‘ bilan burunni yumshatish yoki bug‘li inqalyatsiya qilish
C3: Boshingizni yuqoriga ko‘tarib dam olish va changdan saqlanish

C6: facial_pain, nasal_congestion, headache, thick_nasal_discharge, fever, toothache, fatigue, reduced_sense_of_smell, cough
C7: Maxillary sinusitis (gaymarit) is the inflammation of the maxillary sinuses, usually caused by infections, allergies, or colds. It leads to facial pain, nasal congestion, and thick mucus discharge. It may be acute or chronic.

C2: Burunni sho‘r suv bilan yuvib, ochiqlikni ta’minlash
C3: Chang, gulchang, va allergenlardan uzoq bo‘lish

C7: Rhinitis is the inflammation of the mucous membrane inside the nose, commonly caused by viral infections or allergies. It leads to sneezing, nasal congestion, and a runny nose. It may be acute (cold-related) or allergic.

C2: Achchiq va nordon ovqatlarni darhol to‘xtatish
C3: Issiq iliq ovqatlarni oz-ozdan tez-tez iste’mol qilish

C5: Stressdan saqlaning va ovqatlanish vaqtini muntazam qilish
C6: abdominal_pain, nausea, vomiting, bloating, indigestion, loss_of_appetite, heartburn
C7: Gastritis is the inflammation of the stomach lining, often caused by bacterial infection (like H. pylori), stress, or use of painkillers. It can cause stomach pain, nausea, bloating, and indigestion.

C2: Issiq vanna qabul qilish va orqa-bel sohani tinchlantirish
C3: Ko‘p suv ichish va peshobni ushlab turmaslik

C6: painful_urination, pelvic_pain, frequent_urination, lower_back_pain, painful_ejaculation, fever, chills, fatigue
C7: Prostatitis is the inflammation or infection of the prostate gland, common in men. It can cause painful urination, pelvic discomfort, and sometimes flu-like symptoms. It may be acute or chronic, and is often caused by bacteria or stress-related factors.

C2: Ho‘l salqin mato bilan tozalik qilish va og‘riqni kamaytirish
C3: Ovqat ratsioniga ko‘proq tolali mahsulotlar (meva, sabzavot) qo‘shish

C7: Hemorrhoids are swollen veins in the lower rectum or anus, often caused by straining during bowel movements, chronic constipation, or prolonged sitting. They may be internal or external and can cause pain, itching, and rectal bleeding.

C2: Ko‘p miqdorda suv va tuzli eritma ichish (masalan, regidron)

C6: frequent_loose_stools, abdominal_pain, bloating, nausea, fatigue, dehydration, mild_fever, vomiting
C7: Diarrhea is a condition where a person passes loose or watery stools more frequently than usual. It can be caused by infections (viral, bacterial, or parasitic), contaminated food or water, stress, or certain medications. It may lead to dehydration if not managed properly.

C2: Ko‘p miqdorda toza suv ichish (har kuni kamida 2,5–3 litr)

C7: Kidney stones are hard deposits of minerals and salts that form inside the kidneys or urinary tract. They can cause severe pain, blood in urine, and difficulty urinating. Dehydration, high salt intake, or genetic factors may contribute to their formation.

C2: Tana haroratini tushirish uchun dam olish va ko‘p suyuqlik ichish

C7: Influenza (flu) is a contagious viral infection that affects the respiratory system. It spreads quickly through droplets and causes symptoms such as fever, chills, body aches, and fatigue. Although it usually resolves in a few days, it can lead to complications in the elderly, young children, or those with weak immunity.
